channel.title: RSS Example
channel.description: Test Sitemap Parser for RSS Feeds

item.title: Coffee time: milk or not?
item.description: Want to have a coffee? Lisa's café is open Monday through Saturday from 7 a.m. to 5 p.m.

item.title: Tea time: black or green?
item.description: Want to have a tea? Peter & Mary‘ tea house is open Monday through Saturday from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m., and until 7 p.m. on Thursdays.
